business_summary: Golden Bikes is a long-standing bike rental shop in Golden, Colorado, experiencing increased business volume. The business needs an automated system to manage rentals, inventory, maintenance, payments, customer self-service, and management reporting.

requirements.requirement: I want to rent bikes by the hour or by the day, so that I can support both short and full-day rentals.
I want to track individual bikes and their availability, so that I know which bikes can be rented.
I want to remove bikes from rental rotation for maintenance, so that unsafe or damaged bikes are not rented.
I want the system to be available on web and mobile, so that customers can make reservations anywhere.
I want to offer different bike models for different rider needs, so that customers can choose the right bike.
I want customers to see available bike inventory, so that they can make informed reservations.
I want customers to search bikes by specific characteristics, so that they can quickly find suitable bikes.
I want customers to reserve multiple bikes in one reservation, so that groups and families can rent together.
I want customers to pay with a credit card, so that payments are secure and efficient.
I want to place a hold on a customer’s credit card, so that I can charge for damage or non-returned bikes.
I want to bill the credit card only after bikes are returned, so that charges are accurate.
I want customers to make reservations at an in-store kiosk, so that walk-in customers are supported.
I want the kiosk to support card swiping, so that customers can complete reservations quickly.
I want customers to pick up bikes without employee assistance, so that staff workload is reduced.
I want customers to change or cancel reservations up to 24 hours in advance, so that inventory planning is reliable.
I want employees to process bike returns, so that bikes are inspected and checked back in properly.
I want to automatically calculate late return charges, so that overages are billed consistently.
I want to apply damage fees after inspecting returned bikes, so that repair costs are recovered.
I want to set fees for reservation changes and cancellations, so that policies reflect business needs.
I want employees to return bikes to inventory within 10–20 minutes when possible, so that availability stays accurate.
I want to set bike rental rates, so that pricing can be adjusted over time.
I want different bike categories to have different rental rates, so that pricing reflects value.
I want to add new bikes to inventory, so that the business can grow.
I want a summary report that aggregates other reports, so that I can quickly understand overall performance.
I want daily, weekly, and monthly rental reports by category, so that I can track trends.
I want maintenance reports by individual bike, so that recurring issues can be identified.
I want rental reports by category that drill down by model, so that I can make informed purchasing decisions.
